description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on transforming education, knowledge sharing, and fostering inclusive internet ecosystems. His work spans diverse topics, from exploring the evolution of "ecosystem" concepts to addressing internet fragmentation. yeehaa's courses cover innovative approaches to personal growth, web preservation, and valuing differences. His writings delve into ecosystem architecture, digital landscapes, and the impact of technology on global communication. Through his multifaceted approach, yeehaa aims to cultivate thriving, decentralized organizations and communities that embrace diversity and innovation.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends academia and tech to transform education and foster inclusive internet ecosystems. His work explores evolving concepts of ecosystems, addressing internet fragmentation, and cultivating innovative, decentralized communities.
